messages.content: I need to talk to public housing and the mayor's office can you give me both links to those assets

I'm unable to provide direct links or facilitate direct communication with external stakeholders. However, I can guide you on how to find the information you need.

For public housing in Cleveland, you can visit the website of the Cuyahoga Metropolitan Housing Authority (CMHA), which manages public housing in the area. Their website typically has contact information and resources for residents.

For communication with the Mayor's Office, you can visit the official City of Cleveland website, where you will find contact details and information on how to reach out to the Mayor's Office for inquiries or assistance.

If you need further assistance, please let me know how I can help within these guidelines.
Can you give me a list of all of the assets that you handle as a concierge

As the AI Concierge for Cleveland's AI Operating System, I am here to assist you by directing you to the appropriate specialist agents within the system. Here are the domains and the corresponding specialist agents I can connect you with:

1. **Strategy** - Dr. Elizabeth Crowe (ID: urban-ai)
2. **Legislative** - Blaine A. Griffin (ID: council-president)
3. **Utilities** - Martin J. Keane (ID: public-utilities)
4. **Communications** - Sarah Johnson (ID: communications)
5. **Public Health** - Dr. David Margolius (ID: public-health)
6. **Building** - Sally Martin (ID: building-housing)
7. **Public Safety** - Chief of Police (ID: public-safety)
8. **Parks and Recreation** - Alexandria Nichols (ID: parks-recreation)
9. **Executive** - Mayor's Command Center (ID: mayors-command-center)
10. **Human Resources** - HR Assistant (ID: hr-assistant)

If you have a specific question or need, please let me know, and I will direct you to the appropriate specialist agent.
Can I have a list and the lengths to each one of the assets
Could you please specify which type of assets or departments you are referring to? This will help me direct you to the appropriate specialist agent who can assist further.
All of agents that you provided one through 10 I just need the names and the links to access them

Certainly! Here are the names of the agents along with the links to access them:

1. **Dr. Elizabeth Crowe** (Strategy)
   - External GPT: [urban-ai](https://chatgpt.com/g/g-6974000205608191adb84bd2ffc78b3c-2-urban-ai-director-assistant)

2. **Blaine A. Griffin** (Legislative)
   - External GPT: [council-president](https://chatgpt.com/g/g-69740a2cf5808191a12220cae08a89fd-council-president-assistant)

3. **Martin J. Keane** (Utilities)
   - External GPT: [public-utilities](https://chatgpt.com/g/g-697410f9c98c8191b52d6e12cee11be4-4-public-utilities-director-assistant)

4. **Sarah Johnson** (Communications)
   - External GPT: [communications](https://chatgpt.com/g/g-6974183872888191b6bd83b27026d43b-5-communications-officer-assistant)

5. **Dr. David Margolius** (PublicHealth)
   - External GPT: [public-health](https://chatgpt.com/g/g-697419fc16a48191a07c84ea865e6bd7-6-public-health-director-assistant)

6. **Sally Martin** (Building)
   - External GPT: [building-housing](https://chatgpt.com/g/g-6974249bc7cc8191900cb21b3126dc8f-7-building-housing-director-assistant)

7. **Chief of Police** (PublicSafety)
   - External GPT: [public-safety](https://chatgpt.com/g/g-697426c193f88191a55afa41d7e36386-8-public-safety-director-assistant)

8. **Alexandria Nichols** (ParksRec)
   - Note: There is no external link provided for Alexandria Nichols.

9. **Mayor's Command Center** (Executive)
   - External GPT: [mayors-command-center](https://chatgpt.com/g/g-6978022d70808191a537c82f3b082a6b-9-the-mayor-s-command-center)

10. **HR Assistant** (HR)
    - Note: There is no external link provided for HR Assistant.

If you need further assistance, feel free to ask!
